QuestData.Title: Creche Fallen
QuestData.Description:
This is my failure, $p.
I led these dracthyr here. They knew death was a possibility, but they also trusted me to be there for them.
I should have been down there, clearing the ruins, not up here trawling through books.
<Emberthal balls her fists.>
I need you to retrieve their horn signets. We need to give them honors.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the Horn Signet of Tetsos, Horn Signet of Arrosh, Horn Signet of Ekrati and Horn Signet of Hermin in the Lost Atheneum.
